title: Warm and Cozy Cabin in the Woods
description:
Need to get away?  Then this is the cabin for you!  Nestled in a large forest right inside Vail, this spacious rustic abode offers amazing views of wildlife and nature through over 20 windows.
It's a great place for hiking, mountain biking, and bird watching.  In the winter, warm up in front of the wood burning fireplace with some hot chocolate from the nearby market.
It's the perfect spot to relax.  You can shop the local markets, take a dip in the hot tub or even wrestle a bear out back.  Whatever your pleasure, you're sure to find peace and quiet in the mountains of Vail
note: In winter it gets below -40 Fahrenheit, bring a parka.  Chains on tires are highly recommended.

host.name: Megan
host.note:
Hi my name is Megan. My husband Doug and I live on an old dairy farm just outside of town. We have 5 children. Four of them are in college.
The fifth is in 8th grade. We are excited about getting a chance to travel.  I work for a Caterpillar Company called Solar Turbines here in Vail.
I love to meditate, fence, and snow shoe.  Boy, this is a whole lot of filler text, my fingers are getting tired.  Anyway, I hope your stay with us is a pleasant one.  We strive to provide top notch service as a budget prices.
